events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster after reviewing your experience and skill set.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of your application process.
Your initial screening has been completed successfully. We were impressed by your engineering background and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to our invitation. We appreciate your enthusiasm to proceed further in the recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and let us know if you have any questions.
